comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Crown Prince William of Germany was appointed colonel-in-chief of the English 11th Hussars in 1911. See www.nam.ac.uk/research/famous-units/11th-hussars-prince-a... There had been an earlier 1st Hussars regiment in the King's German Legion of the British Army during the Napoleonic War, but I haven't found a 1st Hussars. Perhaps the postcard caption has a typo.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.hussards-photos.com/UK/UK_11_CPA_Kronprinz.htm shows this picture under the title "11th (Prince Albert's Own) Hussars" and has a note, "The postcard wrongly states that he's in the uniform of the "1st Hussars". "

comment.author: 9308742@N03
comment._content: he looks like Prince Charles. And Queen Elizabeth.
